Text:
Many thanks raymond_u - the most important feature is:

Gilles Villeneuve remembered - Mark Hughes deconstructs the myths surrounding the great French-Canadian on the 30th anniversary of his death

Well worth downloading!
I saw that you uploaded some 2011 DTM races last year... PLEASE O PLEASE O PLEASE can you upload this season's rounds?  Thank you and cheers mate.  Keep up the great work!!
@dertodnebel - I've been intending to; sadly I haven't quite found any good ones yet. Rest assured if I find any I'll upload them. I'm suffering from DTM withdrawal myself!
